alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Madison (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 07 at 3:44PM EST until March 08 at 9:24AM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... White River. Eel River at Bowling Green. .Ongoing and renewed flooding will continue or develop along portions of the East Fork White, White, and Wabash Rivers over the next 24 to 48 hours and beyond. River stages are rising again due to the one to over two and a half inches of rain received from Saturday night through this morning. Minor flooding is expected, which primarily impacts river roads, parks, and agricultural land. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River at Muncie. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Some farmlands and county roads flood. Small park near Daleville floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:30 PM EST Monday the stage was 9.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 3:30 PM EST Monday was 9.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 9.2 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued by later this evening.
